title: Lesson 9: Suffering and Trials
description: Communicating with the Father using the ACTS model or Lord's Prayer model.

blocks.text: Prayer is our vital connection to God. Using models like ACTS (Adoration, Confession, Thanksgiving, Supplication) helps structure our conversation and deepens our reliance on Him.
Do not be anxious about anything, but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known to God.
7.1 - What is one specific area you have been anxious about that you need to hand over in prayer?
